mapper.select: SELECT A.task_code , A.task_contents , A.task_flag , A.task_fixed_state , A.created_at , A.updated_at , A.shop_code FROM Task A
SELECT A.task_code , A.task_contents , A.task_flag , A.task_fixed_state , A.created_at , A.updated_at , A.shop_code FROM Task A WHERE A.task_code = #{ taskCode }
SELECT A.task_code , A.task_contents , A.task_flag , A.task_fixed_state , A.created_at , A.updated_at , A.shop_code FROM Task A WHERE A.task_flag = true
SELECT A.task_code , A.task_contents , A.task_flag , A.task_fixed_state , A.created_at , A.updated_at , A.shop_code FROM Task A WHERE A.task_fixed_state = true
SELECT A.task_code , A.task_contents , A.task_flag , A.task_fixed_state , A.created_at , A.updated_at , A.shop_code FROM Task A WHERE A.shop_code = #{ shopCode }

SELECT A.task_code , A.task_contents , A.task_flag , A.task_fixed_state , A.created_at , A.updated_at , A.shop_code FROM Task A WHERE A.task_flag = true AND A.shop_code = #{ shopCode } AND A.task_fixed_state = true

SELECT A.task_code , A.task_contents , A.task_flag , A.task_fixed_state , A.created_at , A.updated_at , A.shop_code FROM Task A WHERE A.task_flag = true AND A.shop_code = #{ shopCode } AND A.task_fixed_state = false
